ygData.subject: Re: Into the jungle! (Wheelie)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes, why were the the Dinobots acting so un bot like, attacking seemingly anyone, that was just so unlike them. Sure they have always been aggressive

> <OLD - WHEELIE>
>
> There was a sudden pause over from WHEELIE Then as he heard the name
> 'GRIMLOCK'.  A quiet shaking of his head as hew shipered, as if half in
> fear, ahlf in shock, half in (he's bad at math) surprise and half mourning.
> "Grimlock, you say?  With four others..  Dinosaurs if I may?"
>
> The bit with the 'black large car' and the other 'Maximal' hitting him for a
> few moments as he forced some coolant to pump through his systems and cut
> back his emotional subroutines, "For who those two were, I don't know.  But
> I do not know where to go.  If Grimlock is here, why I say..  Would he
> attack another in such a way?"
>
> Shaking his head quietly, processing.  Assuming that it meant Grimlock and
> hte other Dinobots were here on Earth as well, even Grimlock in a poor mood
> would not attack a Maximal with intent to kill.  He might beat them some or
> intimidate, but if what he was being told was true and Grimlock had not held
> back..
>
> Something was wrong.  Definitely wrong.  Grimlock was too stubborn to be
> reprogrammed, and the Predacons, like the Decepticons had tended to utilize
> far more blatant methodologies in reprogramming, at least as he was aware
> of.  And would hardly had let the Dinobots randomly wander around the
> landscape either.  Even in here.  That left the Unicronians, whom what
> little nkowledge of their participation in the BEAST WARS he had read of
> preferred more blatant things as signs of their corruption, like heavy
> upgrades or slave collars..
>
> So, that left one hideously disquieting thought in WHEELIE that with what
> limited data he had seemed the likeliest bit.
>
> That GRIMLOCK and the DINOBOTS had attacked another Maximal brutally and of
> their own free processor and subroutines.
>
> But if so..
>
> WHY?

Yes, why were the the 'Dinobots' acting so un'bot' like, attacking
seemingly anyone, that was just so unlike them. Sure they have always
been aggressive and stubborn and rebellious, but they always seemed to
stop just short of outright attacking, at least with the Autobots.

But then again not much was heard from them once the great wars were
over and the peace accord set in. Most people may have thought they
went their own way, perhaps to fight wars elsewhere in the galaxy, or
perhaps they finally learned the ways of peace. There were many
Autobots who were unable to stop their violent ways after the war had
ended, and had to taken in by the Peace Keepers to be re-educated. But
surely GRIMLOCK and his men were not among those, no never them. Their
contribution to the war had been too great, too important, their
legacy to important.

No, not the Dinobots . . .

UNUS looked at WHEELIE and nodded. "If those other ones were not your
friends, then who are they?" The question somewhat rhetorical as he
ruminated over the question.

DARKHOOF looked confused, "They had the symbol that the other one
described." He said pointing at the door, behind which RODIMUS was
laying.

There was a friendly smile from UNUS as he put a comforting hand on
DARKHOOF, "If they were not individuals that this one has met, they
can still be part of his people." He nodded to him, "I am sure you did
rightly."

DARKHOOF nodded a smile on his face again. He seemed young, if he were
human he would probrably be in his late teens somewhere, perhaps his
early twenties. Young and impressionable, full of hope.

And the hope is dimmed.

DARKHOOF paused for a moment and then looked at UNUS and then the
others like ASTRA, FIREHORN and then his optics coming to rest on
WHEELIE. "I left Raintree to watch after I left. She is really good at
that." He said, a small selfconscious smile on his face for a moment
before he continued. "Your friends . . . I mean the others with that
symbol that we were told to watch for, the wheeled vehicle."

He paused, "Raintree said one of them called him Nightshift was
heavilly damaged, another, the commander she thinks was also damaged
heavily, but they escaped to their shuttle." DARKHOOF looked up at
UNUS, "Swoop was chasing them at the end as they took off. The shuttle
took heavy damage from Grimlock and Slag."

"What of the other, the dragon." UNUS said gently.

DARKHOOF paused for a moment, obviously in communication with
RAINTREE, "She says that he was weakened by his battle with Grimlock
and his men and was taken away by some of Magamtron's forces, led by
Guiledart."

UNUS nodded sagely. "That is not good, that is not good at all." He
looked over at WHEELIE, "Are there any more of your kind here? Perhaps
you warn them of what is going on?"

Which is ofcourse an interesting proposition, except that despite the
fact that the Cornu appear to be communicating, the Maximal (and
Predacon) radio's still appear to still be down.

(TAG)

Preston
